name: On the Flipside (Saxophone Siphonophore)
description:
You are a lucky coin.

While facing one direction, you bring about fortune, sunshine and joy. While facing the other, you bring misery, rain and... indoor umbrellas? Superstitions are a strange thing indeed.

Each level contains an exit door which may only be entered while facing a certain direction. Can you reach the end? Or will your luck run out?

---

This is my entry for the 2022 edition of the annual Game Maker's Toolkit Game jam.

---

CONTROLS:

WASD / Arrow Keys: Movement

Spacebar / Up Arrow / W Key: Jumping

E Key / Enter Key: Interact

F Key: Toggle fullscreen
